articles.description: GYLES BRANDRETH: For her part it seems Elizabeth really had set her heart on Philip long before. Margaret Rhodes confirmed this: 'Princess Elizabeth was enamoured from an early age.'
articles.content:
In September 1928, Winston Churchill who would, one day, be Elizabeth IIs first Prime Minister stayed at ­Balmoral as a guest of King George and Queen Mary.

articles.title: GBBO premiere date confirmed after Queen's death - Digital Spy
articles.description: Bake Off's schedule is staying the same following the Queen's death.
articles.content:
The Great British Bake Offhas announced that it plans to air the 2022 series premiere as scheduled.
